mapper.select: SELECT auction_id, auction_lot, auction_author, auction_title, auction_size, auction_madeDate, auction_materials, auction_authorExp, auction_startPrice, auction_guessPrice, auctionSchedule_id FROM auction_tb WHERE auction_lot = #{auction_lot} AND auctionSchedule_id = #{auctionSchedule_id}

SELECT a.auction_id, a.auction_lot, a.auction_author, a.auction_title, a.auction_size, a.auction_madeDate, a.auction_materials, a.auction_authorExp, a.auction_startPrice, a.auction_guessPrice, a.auctionSchedule_id FROM auction_tb a JOIN auctionschedule_tb s ON a.auctionSchedule_id = s.auctionSchedule_id WHERE s.auctionSchedule_start <= NOW() AND s.auctionSchedule_end >= NOW()

SELECT a.auction_id, a.auction_lot, a.auction_author, a.auction_title, a.auction_size, a.auction_madeDate, a.auction_materials, a.auction_authorExp, a.auction_startPrice, a.auction_guessPrice, a.auctionSchedule_id FROM auction_tb a JOIN auctionschedule_tb s ON a.auctionSchedule_id = s.auctionSchedule_id WHERE s.auctionSchedule_start > NOW() AND s.auctionSchedule_id = ( SELECT MIN(auctionSchedule_id) FROM auctionschedule_tb WHERE auctionSchedule_start > NOW() )

SELECT a.auction_id, a.auction_lot, a.auction_author, a.auction_title, a.auction_size, a.auction_madeDate, a.auction_materials, a.auction_authorExp, a.auction_startPrice, a.auction_guessPrice, a.auctionSchedule_id FROM auction_tb a JOIN auctionschedule_tb s ON a.auctionSchedule_id = s.auctionSchedule_id WHERE s.auctionSchedule_end < NOW()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM auction_tb WHERE auctionSchedule_id = #{auctionSchedule_id}
SELECT bid_money FROM bid_tb WHERE auction_id = #{auction_id} ORDER BY bid_id DESC LIMIT 1;
